'I lived in a pygmy village when I was 19 and travelling through Africa, in 1992-3. They are very real. They were also the best hunters I had ever seen, and spent a lot of time smoking what looked looked like a variety of fish from the rivers. They have a nutrious diet from the land even if they are a little short.'

'I am applying for my polish citizenship even though I have what is suppose to be automatic citizenship for the fact that both my parents are from Poland. Just going through the forms and how time consuming it is plus I am on my own in mastering the polish language....I don't feel sorry for undocumented /illegal aliens, because they take advantage of us.'
